Chiel Connect+

URL:

Chiel Connect+

Agency:

Iris Worldwide

Challenge:

I was tasked by Iris to build a WordPress site to showcase the new intiative from Chiel their parent company called Chiel Connect+ which was an intiative to bring all their different agencies together to work together closer to provide a better overall service.

Solution:

The big thing for this website was animation, they really wanted to show off how far we could push the boundaries. For me it was really nice to work closely with the design team to geta sense of how we would do it. Greensock is a great tool to add a variety of different animation to a wesbite and it was nice to really push myself on this project.

Features:

  • ->  Animation
  • ->  WordPress
  • ->  Modular build

Technology:

Wordpress, HTML, SASS, JavsScript, Node.js, Gulp, Greensock
